data.actual_result: Green circle does not appear or update live. It appears only if you tap the caret right when someone is speaking/making noises, but will not go away when it’s silent. Green circle will not update live time.
data.expected_result: The green circle should show on users who are speaking/making noises in live time.
data.short_description: Green Circle does not light in “In The Voice Channel” view
data.steps_to_repro: - Join a voice channel, by yourself or with people. - Pull up the “In Voice Channel” view. (Access by tapping the caret icon on the bottom of the minimized voice chat after joining) - Observe icons of PFPs
